instruction: any cool anime where characters from different shows team up?
output: If you're into epic team-ups, you gotta check out Dream 9 Toriko & One Piece & Dragon Ball Z Super Collaboration Special!! It's a wild crossover where your favorite heroes join forces. Perfect for some action and laughs! 🎉🔥🍥
